articles.description: Follow live radio commentary and text updates as Ireland face Scotland In Paris for a place in the knockout stages.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup: Build-up to Ireland-Scotland group decider - radio & text

articles.description: Follow live text and audio commentary from the sprint shootout & sprint race at the Qatar Grand Prix.
articles.title: Qatar Grand Prix sprint race build-up: Verstappen can win third title

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen clinches a third world title by finishing second in a chaotic and incident-packed sprint race at the Qatar Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen takes third F1 world title in Qatar

articles.description: Follow live text & score updates as Luton host Tottenham in the first of six Premier League games.
articles.title: Premier League: Luton host Tottenham in early kick-off

articles.description: A sluggish England outlast a bruising, brilliant Samoa performance to head to the quarter-finals with a full house of Pool D wins.
articles.title: England sneak narrow win over superb Samoa

articles.description: Watch live coverage of the MLB Saturday Showdown, with the eight remaining play-off teams playing the first game of the Division Series.
articles.title: Watch: MLB Saturday Showdown - four back-to-back play-off games

articles.description: Preview followed by live coverage of Saturday's Premier League game between Manchester United and Brentford.
articles.title: Manchester United v Brentford team news

articles.description: Aiden Markram hits the fastest World Cup hundred as South Africa made 428-5 - the highest score in the tournament's history - in a 102-run victory over Sri Lanka.
articles.title: Markram hits fastest World Cup century in SA win

articles.description: A bonus-point 43-19 victory over Georgia sees Wales complete a clean sweep of World Cup pool matches, topping Pool C and advancing to the quarter-finals.
articles.title: Wales top pool with bonus-point win over Georgia

articles.description: Raheem Sterling inspires Chelsea to a comeback win at Burnley, who slump to a fifth successive Premier League home defeat of the campaign.
articles.title: Sterling inspires Chelsea to comeback win at Burnley
